mapper.select: SELECT stored_file_name, original_file_name FROM control_board_file WHERE idcontrol_board_file = #{idcontrol_board_file}
SELECT name, phone_num FROM device_phone WHERE Device_info_Id = ( SELECT Id FROM device_info WHERE User_info_employee_num = #{username} )
SELECT name, packagename, size_calc(size) as size, version FROM application_info a INNER JOIN Device_info d ON a.Device_info_Id = d.Id WHERE d.User_info_employee_num = #{username}

SELECT getActive(Active) as Active, Wifi, Bluetooth, Tethering, Camera, VoiceRecord, Alarm, Gps FROM device_management dm INNER JOIN Device_info di ON dm.Device_info_Id = di.Id WHERE di.User_info_employee_num = #{username}
